full_summary:
===============

**Request for Proposal for Top Secret - Engineering and Infrastructure Security Services**

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada (SSC)

**Services Required:**
----------------------

SSC seeks qualified contractors to provide Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) for a period of two years. The services required include:

* One (1) C.3 Information Technology Security TRA and C&A Analyst
* Three (3) C.6 IT Security Engineers
* Three (3) C.7a IT CDS Security Design Specialists (Cross Domain Solution)
* Three (3) C.7b IT Security Design Specialists
* Three (3) C.8 Network Security Analysts

**Security Requirements:**
-----------------------

* Minimum Corporate Security Required: FSC - Top Secret with Access to Control Goods and Foreign Ownership, Control or Influence (FOCI)
* Minimum Resource Security Required: Top Secret

**Eligible Contractors:**
-----------------------

The following contractors have been invited to submit a proposal:

* 1511995 Ontario Inc.
* Accenture Inc.
* ADGA Group Consultants Inc.
* ... (pulled list for brevity)

**Important Notes:**

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language.
* Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Method of Supply is refreshed three times per year. To become a qualified contractor, contact [RCNMDAI-NCRIMOS@tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:RCNMDAI-NCRIMOS@tpsgc.gc.ca).

**Proposal Submission:**

Inquiries regarding this Request for Proposal must be submitted to the Contracting Authority named above. Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be e-mailed directly from the Contracting Authority to the qualified contractors who are being invited to bid on this requirement.

**Contact Information:**

* Contracting Authority: Dusan Adamov
* Phone Number: 613-294-2380
* Email Address: [dusan.adamov@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:dusan.adamov@ssc-spc.gc.ca)

Note: The original text has been reformatted to improve readability and brevity. The content has been preserved, but some minor re-phrasing has been performed to ensure clarity and precision. A more comprehensive understanding of the requirements and procedures should be sought by contacting the Contract
